page.title: 12Visit to the Police Station
page.content:
I went to the police station. The policeman took us into a room where paper work was. Then the policeman took us to a room with a camera. The police take photographs of bad people. The policeman said that he would bring his motorbike over to the school to show us. We saw the cells and some boys were locked in. Noami had a go on the personal radio. She said "What is your name?" and a policeman replied "I don't know." The policeman showed us his uniform and his truncheon. His uniform is black. It has a silver chain with a whistle on the end. In the police car there were bollards.
by Ginette
